00008 #define RE 6.378e6             /*    The radius of the earth in m.    */
00009 
00010 #define GFS 9.8                /*    The reduced gravity at the free  */
00011                                /*  surface, in m s-2.                 */
00012 #define DMAX 6500.0            /*    The maximum depth of the basin,  */
00013                                /*  in m.  This is required for        */
00014                                /*  initanal.c to give valid advice.   */
00015 #define MINIMUM_DEPTH 1e-6     /*    The minimum ocean depth, in m.   */
00016                                /*  Anything shallower than this depth */
00017                                /*  is assumed to be on land, and all  */
00018                                /*  appropriate fluxes are masked out. */
00019 #define GINT .1177             /*    The reduced gravity of the       */
00020                                /*  internal interfaces, in m s-2.     */
00021                                /*  GINT may be superceded in          */
00022                                /*  initialize.c, but GINT should be   */
00023                                /*  the average of all interface       */
00024                                /*  reduced gravities for initanal.c   */
00025                                /*  to give appropriate advice.        */
00026 #define LENLAT   166.5         /*    The length of the basin in       */
00027 #define LENLON   360.0         /*  degrees of latitude and longitude. */
00028 #define LOWLAT  (-77.5)        /*  The southern latitude of the basin.*/
00029 #define WESTLON (-280)         /*  The western longitude of the basin.*/

00195 /*  Specify the numerical domain.                                     */

00197 #define XMETRIC_J              /*    Define XMETRIC_J if the x-direc- */
00198 #define XMETRIC_I              /*  tion metrics vary in the y- (or j^)*/
00199 #define YMETRIC_J              /*  direction.  Otherwise undefine     */
00200 #define YMETRIC_I              /*  XMETRIC_J.  XMETRIC_I, YMETRIC_J,  */
00201                                /*  and YMETRIC_I are used similarly.  */
00202                                /*  CARTESIAN overrides all of these   */
00203                                /*  choices.                           */
00204                                /*    For example, on a regular lat-   */
00205                                /*  itude longitude grid, define       */
00206                                /*  XMETRIC_J and undefine the rest.   */
00207                                /*  For a Mercator grid, define        */
00208                                /*  only XMETRIC_J and YMETRIC_J.      */
00209 
00210 
00211 #define NXTOT   360            /*    NXTOT and NYTOT are the numbers  */
00212 #define NYTOT   210            /*  thickness grid points in the zonal */
00213                                /*  and meridional directions of the   */
00214                                /*  physical domain.                   */
00215 #define NZ  49                 /*    The number of layers.            */
00216 
00217 #ifdef SERIAL_IO_CODE          /*    SERIAL_IO_CODE is specified on   */
00218                                /*  the compile line of postprocessing */
00219                                /*  code.                              */
00220 # define NETCDF_OUTPUT          /*    Do not change this line.         */
00221 #else
00222 # undef   MPI_PARALLEL          /*    If MPI_PARALLEL is defined, the  */
00223                                /*  parallelization is done using the  */
00224                                /*  MPI subroutines.  Otherwise SHMEM  */
00225                                /*  subroutines are used.  This option */
00226                                /*  affects subroutines HIM_par.c and  */
00227                                /*  HIM_par_IO.c.                      */
00228 # undef   PARALLEL_X            /*    Define PARALLEL_X if there is to */
00229                                /*  be domain decomposition in the X-  */
00230                                /*  direction.                         */
00231 # undef   PARALLEL_Y            /*    Define PARALLEL_Y if there is to */
00232                                /*  be domain decomposition in the Y-  */
00233                                /*  direction.                         */
00234 # undef   PARALLEL_IO           /*  With PARALLEL_IO and NETCDF_OUTPUT */
00235                                /*  defined, each processor writes out */
00236                                /*  its own NetCDF file.  These files  */
00237                                /*  can be combined using the utility  */
00238                                /*  mppnccombine.                      */
00239 # define  NETCDF_OUTPUT         /*    If NETCDF_OUTPUT is defined, all */
00240                                /*  output files are in NetCDF format  */
00241                                /*  and all input files are examined   */
00242                                /*  to determine whether they are      */
00243                                /*  in NetCDF format or in unformatted */
00244                                /*  C binary.                          */
00245 #endif
00246 
00247 #ifdef PARALLEL_X
00248 #define NXPROC 1               /*    NXPROC is the minimum number of  */
00249                                /*  processors in the x-direction.     */
00250 #endif
00251 #ifdef PARALLEL_Y
00252 #define NYPROC 1               /*    NYPROC is the minimum number of  */
00253                                /*  processors in the y-direction.     */
00254                                /*  The minimum total number of        */
00255                                /*  processors is NXPROC*NYPROC.       */
00256 #endif
00257 #define MAXPROC 64             /*    MAXPROC is the maximum number of */
00258                                /*  processors that might be used      */
00259                                /*  without recompiling.  MAXPROC must */
00260                                /*  exceed NXPROC*NYPROC or NXPROC or  */
00261                                /*  NYPROC, or be undefined.           */
00262 
00263 #undef  CHECKPARALLEL          /*    If CHECKPARALLEL is defined, it  */
00264                                /*  causes the model to run simultan-  */
00265                                /*  eously on one and several process- */
00266                                /*  ors.  The subroutine check_field   */
00267                                /*  can then be called to compare the  */
00268                                /*  fields in the serial and parallel  */
00269                                /*  simulations, reporting any diff-   */
00270                                /*  erences.                           */
00271 
00272 #define SAVEINT    5.0         /*    The number of days between saves.*/
00273                                /* I believe currently NOT used: Suzanne */
00274 #define DT 3600.0              /*    Time step in seconds.            */
00275                              /* Standard case is one month = 3600.0  */
00276 #define EPSILON 1.0e-10        /*   The minimum layer thickness, in m.*/
00277

00279 /*  The following lines should not be modified.                       */
00280 #define X0 1                   /*    X0 is the offset of the physical */
00281                                /*  domain from the memory domain.     */
00282 #define X1 (X0+1)              /*    X1 is the lowest index of the    */
00283                                /*  physical domain (as opposed to the */
00284                                /*  memory halo) on each processor.    */
00285 #define Y0 1
00286 #define Y1 (Y0+1)
00287 #ifdef PARALLEL_X
00288 # ifdef CHECKPARALLEL
00289 # define NXMEM (NXTOT+2*(X0+1))
00290 # else
00291 # define NXMEM (((NXTOT-1)/NXPROC)+1+2*(X0+1)) /* NXMEM is the maximum    */
00292                                /*  number of grid points in the       */
00293                                /*  x-direction on each processor.     */
00294 # endif
00295 #else
00296 # define NXMEM (NXTOT+2*(X0+1))
00297 # define nx (NXTOT+X0)         /*   nx is the maximum index of the    */
00298                                /*  domain on each processor if there  */
00299                                /*  is no parallelization in x.        */
00300 #endif                         /* PARALLEL_X */
00301 #ifdef PARALLEL_Y
00302 # ifdef CHECKPARALLEL
00303 # define NYMEM (NYTOT+2*(Y0+1))
00304 # else
00305 # define NYMEM (((NYTOT-1)/NYPROC)+1+2*(Y0+1)) /* NYMEM is the maximum    */
00306                                /*  number of grid points in the       */
00307                                /*  x-direction on each processor.     */
00308 # endif
00309 #else
00310 # define NYMEM (NYTOT+2*(Y0+1))
00311 # define ny (NYTOT+Y0)         /*   nx is the maximum index of the    */
00312                                /*  domain on each processor if there  */
00313                                /*  is no parallelization in x.        */
00314 #endif                         /* PARALLEL_Y */
